name: ChemistryHist
description: Simple entity with alloy and particle compositions evolution over time.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: Chemical symbol of each chemical element.  By convension the dependent element (e.g. Al) is the first element.

properties.name: phases
properties.description: Name of each phase. Matrix is the first phase.

properties.name: X0
properties.description: Nominal composition.  Should sum to one.

properties.name: Xp
properties.description: Average composition of each phase.  Each row should sum to one.

properties.name: volfrac
properties.description: Volume fraction of each phase at each time.

properties.name: rmean
properties.description: Average particle radius of each phase at each time step.  The mean radius of matrix is always zero.

properties.name: atvol
properties.description: Average volume per atom for each phase.
